Here is how you start using Caddy

```{mermaid}

classDiagram
    class Messages {
        messageId
        message
        conversationId
        userEmail
        client
        messageRecievedTimestamp
        messageSentTimestamp
    }
    class Responses {
        responseId
        llmResponseJson
        llmPrompt
        messageId
        llmAnswer
        userThankedTimestamp
        llmPromptTimestamp
        llmResponseTimestamp
        approverEmail
        approved
        approvalTimestamp
        userResponseTimestamp
    }
    class Users {
        userEmail
        supervisionSpaceId
        createdAt
        isApprover
        isSuperUser
    }
    Users -- Messages : UserId
    Messages -- Responses : MessageId
```
